name: Saint Martin Dividing His Cloak with a Beggar
description: Saint Martin Dividing His Cloak with a Beggar; Lorenzo Lotto (Italian (Venetian), about 1480 - 1556); about 1530; Brush with gray-brown wash, heightened with white and cream-colored gouache, over black chalk on brown paper; 31.4 x 21.7 cm (12 3/8 x 8 9/16 in.); 83.GG.262; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Saint Martin Dividing His Cloak with a Beggar
medium: Brush with gray-brown wash, heightened with white and cream-colored gouache, over black chalk on brown paper
